name: FNF - Remix Mod (Demo)
description:
Welcome to the Friday Night Funkin' Remix mod. This mod was made entirely by me, Discussion. There is a private beta up so if you want toats on that, message me over at discord. The private beta has 12 songs and a kade engine verision right now while the public has 5 songs and no kade. Message me over at Discord and I might give access!  Discussions#7388

Pico and Blammed were originally going to be a Foolhardy remix and a Ballistic ne but I ended up scrapping them. So the demo only has 6 songs. Fits for a demo right?

Anyways have fun with the demo! The finished project is being head back becuase my friend is getting back with vocals!
